content:
(pressing hands together apologetically)
I just need some time to clean up.
You... wouldn't want to sleep on dried glue, would you?

content:
Is it weird to have stone lion statues in your house?
<size=64>Not at all!</size>

content:
When I was little,
Mommy said I would sleepwalk and do radio calisthenics in my sleep.
These days, I probably do lobster-punching moves instead, don't you think?

content: All the "Eighteen Arms of Wushu" here are made of foam rubber, so they're totally safe! Don't worry!
